beyond-hitting.title: The Beyond Hitting course will show you how to respond
beyond-hitting.body: You'll replace panic with a clear next move — through narrated audio lessons, illustrated response guides, and a community of parents handling the same aggression.

big-feelings.title: The Big Feelings course will teach you to guide intensity
big-feelings.body: Your kid processes the wave instead of drowning in it — through narrated audio lessons, illustrated coaching guides, and a community who gets the volume.

body-safety.title: The Body Safety Conversations course will give you the words
body-safety.body: You'll talk about consent and boundaries without freezing up — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated age-by-age guides, and parents practicing the same conversations.

breaking-the-cycle.title: The Breaking the Cycle course will help you parent differently
breaking-the-cycle.body: You'll catch inherited patterns before they land — through narrated audio lessons, illustrated self-reflection guides, and a community rewriting the same scripts.

calm-parent.title: The Calm Parent course will teach you to stay regulated under fire
calm-parent.body: You'll catch the escalation before your voice does — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated de-escalation guides, and a community practicing the same reset.

childhood-anxiety.title: The Childhood Anxiety course will help you shrink the worry cycle
childhood-anxiety.body: Your child starts doing things fear currently blocks — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated guides for each anxiety pattern, and parents navigating the same avoidance.

discipline-without-punishment.title: The Discipline Without Punishment course will show you what actually holds
discipline-without-punishment.body: Your limits stick without threats or volume — through narrated audio lessons, illustrated boundary-setting guides, and parents building the same firm-but-calm approach.

intentional-parenting.title: The Intentional Parenting course will help you build your own approach
intentional-parenting.body: You'll stop borrowing from ten frameworks and start parenting from one — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated decision guides, and a community doing the same.

life-transitions.title: The Life Transitions course will show you how to prepare your child
life-transitions.body: Your kid handles the upheaval instead of unraveling in it — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated preparation guides, and a community navigating the same changes.

new-parent.title: The New Parent Survival course will walk you through year one
new-parent.body: You'll handle the chaos without losing yourself in it — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated week-by-week guides, and parents deep in the same fog.

parenting-science.title: The Science of Parenting course will show you what research says
parenting-science.body: You'll make decisions from data instead of Instagram posts — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated research breakdowns, and a community that reads the studies too.

parenting-teens.title: The Parenting Teens course will help you stay connected through adolescence
parenting-teens.body: You'll keep the relationship open without surrendering every boundary — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated conversation guides, and parents raising the same eye-rollers.

peaceful-mealtimes.title: The Peaceful Mealtimes course will help you end the food fights
peaceful-mealtimes.body: You'll sit down without bribes, pressure, or short-order cooking — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated mealtime guides, and a community ditching the same battles.

potty-training.title: The Potty Training course will walk you through it day by day
potty-training.body: You'll follow a clear sequence instead of guessing what went wrong — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated daily guides, and parents troubleshooting the same regressions.

screen-sanity.title: The Screen Sanity course will help you set boundaries that hold
screen-sanity.body: Screen time stops being a daily negotiation — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated family media guides, and a community managing the same devices.

sibling-harmony.title: The Sibling Harmony course will teach you to referee less
sibling-harmony.body: Your kids start solving their own fights — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated conflict guides, and parents reducing the same sibling chaos.

sleep-solutions.title: The Sleep Solutions course will help you build a routine that holds
sleep-solutions.body: Bedtime lands in a predictable window, no crying required — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated routine guides, and parents who solved the same stalling.

social-skills.title: The Social Skills course will help your child make friends that stick
social-skills.body: Your kid walks into a room knowing what to do — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated social coaching guides, and parents building the same confidence.

spirited-kids.title: The Spirited Kids course will show you how to channel intensity
spirited-kids.body: You'll stop trying to tone your kid down and start channeling what's there — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated guides, and parents raising the same wiring.

tantrum-toolkit.title: The Tantrum Toolkit course will give you a move for every scenario
tantrum-toolkit.body: You'll stop improvising and start responding from a playbook — with narrated audio lessons, illustrated scenario guides, and parents handling the same meltdowns.

age-appropriate-chores.eyebrow: Which chores match your kid's ability?
age-appropriate-chores.title: Get your child's personalized chore recommendations
age-appropriate-chores.body: Your full results show which household tasks your child can handle independently, which need scaffolding, and which to skip for now. Plus specific chore suggestions matched to each capability area.

bedtime-battle-style.eyebrow: Want to see your full profile?
bedtime-battle-style.title: Get your complete bedtime battle style breakdown
bedtime-battle-style.body: See your primary type, your strengths at bedtime, your growth edge, and how your style blends across all four types.

bedtime-routine.eyebrow: What actually works for your kid's bedtime?
bedtime-routine.title: Get your child's personalized bedtime routine blueprint
bedtime-routine.body: Your full results show which bedtime strategies are working, which areas need attention, and specific tweaks matched to your child's regulation style for smoother transitions to sleep.

calm-down-toolkit.eyebrow: Which channels actually work for your kid?
calm-down-toolkit.title: Get your child's personalized calm-down strategy card
calm-down-toolkit.body: Your full results show which regulation channels are primary for your child, specific strategies matched to each channel, and which approaches are worth exploring versus the ones you can skip entirely.

co-parent-team.title: Get your complete co-parenting team profile
co-parent-team.body: Your primary team style, unique strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all styles.

communication-safety.title: Get your child's complete communication safety profile
communication-safety.body: See how emotionally safe your child feels across all four dimensions — emotional disclosure, trust in your response, repair after conflict, and their willingness to initiate hard conversations. Plus domain insights and a prioritized action plan.

drop-the-nap.title: Get your child's complete nap readiness profile
drop-the-nap.body: See exactly where your child stands across sleep patterns, energy levels, nighttime sleep, and temperament, plus a concrete action plan for whether to keep the nap, drop it, or try quiet time.

emotional-intelligence.title: Get your child's complete emotional intelligence profile
emotional-intelligence.body: See how your child's EQ breaks down across self-awareness, regulation, empathy, and social skills. Find out what's strong, what's developing, and where small shifts make the biggest difference.

kid-describe-you.eyebrow: Want to see the full picture?
kid-describe-you.title: Get your complete profile from your kid's perspective
kid-describe-you.body: See your primary type, what your kid experiences as your strengths, your growth edge, and how all four types blend in your parenting.

kindergarten-readiness.title: Get your child's complete kindergarten readiness profile
kindergarten-readiness.body: See exactly where your child stands across academic foundations, social skills, emotional regulation, and self-care independence, plus a prioritized action plan for what to practice between now and the first day.

parent-at-2am.title: Get your complete nighttime parenting profile
parent-at-2am.body: Your primary type, unique strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all types.

parenting-battery.eyebrow: Want to see the full picture?
parenting-battery.title: Get your complete parenting battery profile
parenting-battery.body: See how your energy holds up across all four dimensions — physical capacity, emotional reserves, connection quality, and self-care. Find out where you're holding strong and where you're running low.

parenting-era.title: Get your complete parenting era profile
parenting-era.body: Your primary era, strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all eras.

parenting-love-language.title: Get your complete parenting love language profile
parenting-love-language.body: Your primary type, strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all types.

parenting-style.title: Get your complete parenting style profile across all four dimensions
parenting-style.body: See which dimension leads your profile, how all four styles compare in your blend, your specific strengths, and the growth edge that would shift the most for you.

parenting-superpower.title: Get your complete parenting superpower profile
parenting-superpower.body: Your primary type, strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all four superpowers.

parents-patterns.title: Get your complete parenting pattern profile
parents-patterns.body: Your primary type, strengths, growth edge, and how you compare across all patterns.

potty-training-readiness.title: Get your child's complete potty training readiness profile
potty-training-readiness.body: See exactly where your child stands across physical, cognitive, emotional, and behavioral readiness, plus a concrete action plan for what to do next, whether that means starting now or waiting.

screen-dependence.title: Get your family's complete screen dependence profile
screen-dependence.body: See how screens show up across emotional regulation, social connection, daily routines, and content quality. Find out where you're doing well and where things are tilting into dependence.

second-child-readiness.title: Get your family's complete readiness profile
second-child-readiness.body: See exactly where your family stands across relationship stability, emotional capacity, practical infrastructure, and your first child's development, plus a prioritized action plan for what to strengthen before trying.

sleepover-readiness.title: Get your child's complete sleepover readiness profile
sleepover-readiness.body: See exactly where your child stands across emotional independence, self-care, social confidence, and nighttime management, plus a concrete action plan for whether to say yes now or wait.

social-confidence.title: Get your child's complete social confidence profile
social-confidence.body: See how they're doing across all four social domains — peer interaction, conflict navigation, independence, and communication. Get domain-by-domain insights and a prioritized action plan.

solid-foods-readiness.title: Get your baby's complete solid foods readiness profile
solid-foods-readiness.body: See exactly where your baby stands across physical, oral motor, interest, and digestive readiness, plus a concrete action plan for what to do next, whether that means starting now or waiting.

worried-parent.title: Get your complete worry-response profile
worried-parent.body: Your primary response style, specific strengths in how you handle uncertainty, your growth edge, and how you compare across all response types.
